trends: There have been no other sightings in Natick
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailssince jan. 03, 2012, extraterrestrial space orbs have been making grids over fisk pond\lake cochituate, route 135, natick, mass. u.s.a. they can be observed between dusk and dawn, and can be seen with the naked eye, although binoculars will allow one to see the lines, and other craft more clearly. the grids fly at between five and ten mile altitudes. for over a year no one has reported these on-going events. may be for good reason. also since the vatican has revealed alien activity seen from their arizona observatory, it may be time for the u.s. government to do so as well. it is difficult to tell about these events because they are nightly , and anyone can report them, but none have. end of message.
